
describe-cases
**************


DESCRIPTION
===========

This action returns a list of cases that you specify by passing one or
more CaseIds. In addition, you can filter the cases by date by setting
values for the AfterTime and BeforeTime request parameters. The
response returns the following in JSON format: * One or more
>>`<<CaseDetails <http://docs.aws.amazon.com/awssupport/latest/APIRefe

   rence/API_CaseDetails.html>`_ data types.

* One or more *NextToken* objects, strings that specifies where to
  paginate the returned records represented by *CaseDetails* .


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws support describe-cases
     [--language <value>]
     [--include-resolved-cases ]
     [--max-results <value>]
     [--after-time <value>]
     [--case-id-list <value>]
     [--display-id <value>]
     [--next-token <value>]
     [--before-time <value>]


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

None


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

"--language"  (string)

"--include-resolved-cases"  (boolean)

"--max-results"  (integer)

"--after-time"  (string)

"--case-id-list"  (list of string)

   *Parameter Syntax*

      ["string", ...]

"--display-id"  (string)

"--next-token"  (string)

"--before-time"  (string)
